transArray.content: I was very satisfied with my stay. The attitude was great and they gave me free hand cream. What I especially emphasize is that their oranges are so delicious.

Dear guest, thank you for your 5-point review. We will work hard to provide a better stay environment for our guests. Orange friends are also working hard to use the most considerate service to leave the best stay for every family member we welcome. A good stay experience. I hope you can pay more attention to Xiaoju. Xiaojuâ€™s growth is inseparable from your support. Thank you very much for your review. I look forward to meeting you again after Orange. I wish you a happy life! Hotel Manager: Zhang Minghui
